archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Researchfish
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Researchfish is a service which operates for funders, institutes and researchers to standardise and collect research outcomes to increase consistency and transparency.
Researchfish is the national standard for the UK and is now being used by over 100 funders and research institutes, across multiple research disciplines, spanning the UK, Canada and Scandinavia. Click for a full list of members
Researchfish captures consistent and structured outcomes which can all be used to provide evidence and, therefore, accountability to stakeholders.
https://www.researchfish.com/
